note:
Science Dad, once an ordinary parent with a love for all things science, accidentally discovered his unique superpower during a kitchen experiment gone awry. The infamous Mentos and Diet Coke concoction resulted in a spectacular explosion, propelling him into the hearts of the town's young residents...and into reconciliation with the town's Mayor.

Recognizing his talent for turning science into comedy, the mayor ultimately enlisted Science Dad to lead the Super Science Club.
